{{Description|A famous restaurant known in<!--"as" in-game, but that is an incorrect translation--> Chihu Rock. Some say that the goal of this restaurant is to keep everyone on earth well fed, while others believe that it strives to unify all the regional cuisines of the world. Either way, with its unique dishes, Wanmin Restaurant is surely a place worth visiting. If you really don't have time, why not grab some takeout?|World Map description}}
{{Lang|'''Wanmin Restaurant'''|zh=万民堂|zh_rm=Wànmín-táng}} is a shop that can be found in [[Liyue Harbor]], run by [[Chef Mao]], [[Xiangling]]'s father. They sell simple [[Food]], [[Cooking Ingredients]], and [[Cooking]] recipes.

The Food and Cooking Ingredient stocks refresh on [[World Reset Timers|daily reset]] at different times, depending on the item. Recipes do not restock.

Once players reach [[Reputation]] Rank 4 in Liyue, a 10% discount will be permanently available.
